title: DAILY DIVIDEND | Wed, 14 Jan
html:
Lindt Crushes Sales, China hits Record Trade, Premier Inn Ralliesâ€¦

S&P 500: -0.19% | Gold: +1.10% | Bitcoin: -0.51% | VIX: +1.06%

ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³Chinaâ€™s Record Trade Surplus
China hit a record $1.19T surplus in 2025 despite a 20% drop in U.S. exports. Beijing is aggressively pivoting trade toward Southeast Asia and Africa to offset Western "decoupling."

ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Japan Hits All-Time High
The Nikkei 225 hit record highs as traders bet on a snap election. Investors are front-running expectations for fresh fiscal stimulus and continued expansionary policy.

ğŸ” STOCK SPOTLIGHT

Moderna (BioTech Powerhouse) +17.0%
Stock soared after raising 2025 revenue guidance to $1.9B and citing 2026 as "pivotal" for its cancer and flu-combo vaccines.

Whitbread (Premier Inn Owner) +7.1%
London revenue jumped 7% and German sales rose 12%. The stock surged as the German division finally nears full-year profitability.

Lindt & SprÃ¼ngli (Swiss Chocolatier) +2.1%
Lindt smashed estimates with 12.4% organic growth, proving premium pricing power and "Dubai Chocolate" demand despite record-high cocoa costs.

ğŸ“˜ Term of the Day: Front-Running
Trading to capitalize on advance knowledge of a pending event. Seen today in Japan as traders buy in ahead of expected stimulus.
